channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 03:19 Dumping anxiety in the Kyiv region. Further in further messages.
item.description: 游릭 03:19 Dumping anxiety in the Kyiv region. Further in further messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
